unnormalised: Arre yaar, hea recipe-k 250 gms maida ani 150 ml doodh zai mhunta. Konn ashem mapta? Maim mhuji "andaaz se" ghalta, je sumar 1 cup pito ani "thoda sa" dudh asta. Final product ekdum mast nam tor ekdum flop zata, punn hey, te bhartiye jevnnachem moje aahe, bare? Kiteak nam hanv thodi halad shubhank ghaltam, asli tori instructions-an na. ðŸ˜œ
normalised: Arre yaar, hya recipe-ak donso panchas gram maida ani ekso panchas milliliter doodh zai mhanta. Konn maptol asa tech porim? Mhajhi aai fakta "andaaz se" takta, je eka cup-an pit ani "thoda sa" dudh asta. Shevotacho utpon either bhari aachem zata vo ekdom fashil, punn hey, te Bharotiye jevnachi maja, baraabar na? Zaite asa hanv fakta thodi halad subhachi mhonnun takta, asli tori instructions-an na. winking face
